inclusion.criterion: Chronic HCV infection, defined as detectable HCV antibody (anti-HCV; Abbott HCV EIA 2.0, Abbott Laboratories, Abbott Park, Illinois, USA) and quantifiable serum HCV RNA (Cobas TaqMan HCV Test v2.0, Roche Diagnostics GmbH, Mannheim, Germany, lower limit of quantification [LLOQ]: 25 IU/mL) for ≥ 6 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to provide written informed consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
